Name: Epiphany!
About the game: Epiphany! is a puzzle game based on abstract logic and lateral thinking. Discover the hidden rule for the sequence pattern. The infinity of possible combinations is what makes the game challenging and imprevisible, with high difficulty. A game for the people who really like logical challenges. A complex and compelling puzzle Infinite procedural levels High replayability value Steam Achievements Playable on Windows and Linux
